explanation_custom_functions.message: Opera's standard scrolling experience is sometimes a bit jerky and slow. By activating these options the extension also takes over the corresponding scrolling, which should result in a noticeable performance boost.

color.message: scroll bars, the superbar اور the scroll buttons کا رنگ:

hover_size.message: Width (respectively height for horizontal bars) when hovered with the mouse

explanation_save_set.message: You can save your current configuration here. Just enter a name and click the save-button. If you choose a name that already exists this entry gets overwritten.

fullscreen_only.message: scroll bars پورے اسکرین کے موڈ میں استعمال کے قابل ہیں.

explanation_superbar.message:
The "superbar" is a combination of a horizontal and a vertical scroll bar.
Thus, it only gets visible when both bars are necessary.
Its position is aligned with the vertical and horizontal scroll bars.

bg_special_ends.message: background bars scrolls کے کونے پے Click کرنے سے صفحے کے کے آخر پے چلے جاۓ.

contextmenu_over_only.message: جب میں دایاں-click کروں modern scroll کی شکل پر:

how_to.message: How do I use this extension?

size.message: چوڑائی(افقی scroll bars کے لیے بالترتیب اونچائی) عام حالت میں.

show_how_long.message: How long do you want the bars to stay visible?

show_superbar_minipage.message: ایک mini-version دکھائیں ویب سائٹ کے پس منظر میں جب super bar کو گھسیٹنے.

footer.message: استعمال کرنے کا شکریا،سوال پوچھنے کے لیے آپ کسی بھی وقت مجھ سے رابطہ کر سکتے ھین۔

drag_buttons.message: You can drag the buttons to any position here in the options. This position will become the default for all websites. If they cover an element on some pages, you still will be able to drag them out of the way there

description.message: Takes scrolling to a whole new level

show_contextmenu_when.message: When do you want an option in the context menu for hiding modern scroll?

mousescroll_velocity.message: Velocity of scrolling by mouse wheel and trackpad

superbar_opacity.message: Opacity of the superbar on hover

hbar_at_top.message: Display the horizontal scroll bar at the top instead of bottom

move_bars_during_scroll.message: Animate the scroll bars during scrolling with the mouse wheel / keyboard

explanation_animate_scroll.message:
اگر آپ یہ اختیار منتخب کریں، صفحہ فوری طور پر مطلوبہ پوزیشن پر نھیں جاۓ گا، لیکن خود بخود ایک سایڈست کی شرح کے ساتھ وہاں scroll کر جاۓ گا۔
یۂ scroll buttons، background bars، keyboard کی scrolling پر بھی لاگو ھوتا ھے(اگر "کی بورڈ کے لئے اپنی مرضی کے مطابق سکرولانگ افعال استعمال کریں" زیر عمل ہے)۔

explanation_move_bars_during_scroll.message:
Deactivate this option if you encounter performance problems.
The scroll bars' positions will only be updated when scrolling has finished.

normal.message: Upon hovering, while scrolling and at changes of position or size

default_change_impossible.message: You cannot alter the default configuration! Please choose another name.

confirm_overwrite.message: Do you really want to overwrite this configuration?

mousescroll_distance.message: Distance scrolled per mouse wheel rotation

disable_standard_bars.message:
If you don't use modern scroll exclusively in fullscreen mode, Opera's standard scrollbars should be disabled to avoid double bars.
To do so, go to Opera → Settings → Preferences... (Ctrl+F12) → Advanced → Browsing and deactivate "show scroll bars" there.

gap.message: Distance to the border of the window

external_interface.message: Provide an interface for external access

explanation_external_interface.message:
By checking this option, modern scroll will provide some of its key features for usage by third-party-extensions, websites or you. You can then e.g. create custom mouse gestures.
Visit the documentation to learn more about it.

show_buttons.message: Show buttons for scrolling to the top/bottom of the page

only_over.message: Only when hovered with the mouse

show_when.message: When do you want the bars to show up?

default_delete_impossible.message: You cannot delete the default configuration!

keyscroll_velocity.message: Velocity of scrolling via the arrow keys

vbar_at_left.message: vertical scroll bar دائیں کے بجائے بائیں طرف دکھائیں۔

confirm_delete.message: Do you really want to irreversibly delete this configuration?

container1.message: Trigger modern scroll within a distance of
